pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.utilities

Class DateConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.utilities.DateConverter

  • public class DateConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class exists because there is no possibility to store a Date-type in a Room Database. So it was decided to store DateTime as milliseconds. This methods provide a chance to convert between milliseconds and Date. It is implemented in the models, where needed, through the @TypeConverter annotation.
    See Also:
    UserData.lastLogin

      • fromTimestamp

        public static java.util.GregorianCalendar fromTimestamp(java.lang.Long value)
        Method for converting a long into a the date type GregorianCalendar.
        Parameters:
        value - Time in milliseconds (usually from database)
        Returns:
        GregorianCalendar which represents the milliseconds as a date

      • millisToTimestamp

        public static java.lang.Long millisToTimestamp(java.util.GregorianCalendar calendar)
        Method for converting the date type GregorianCalendar into long.
        Parameters:
        calendar - GregorianCalendar which represents a specific date
        Returns:
        The value of the transferred date in milliseconds
